label: 氏長者
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The leading Fujiwara of the day, officially designated by the Court as head of the clan (uji no chōja), ordinarily controlled the government either as the Emperor's Regent or as a senior Minister of State (p. 795).
